expo.name: HEC Seed
expo.description: Official HEC Seed app for the April 2019 conference, April 30th in Paris, France. Scan your own ticket so you can scan other people's QR during the conference to exchange contact.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We don't track your location but some of the app modules have this feature though they are not used by the app.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera is needed to scan your QRcode.
